/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery contrasting against the blue sky and the various colors of the vehicles on the street.
